NO. CAS-9(15)/98/PIC 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
‘A’ WING, JANPATH BHAWAN, 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI – 110001 
Dated: 26.03.10 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR NO.        09    /2010 
 
 
SUBJECT : RENEWAL OF AIRPORT ENTRY PASSES (AEP) EXPIRED ON 
31.12.2009. 
 
 
 In continuation to this Bureau Circular No. 17/2009 Dt. 07.12.2009, 
validity of the existing computerized Airport Entry Passes (AEPs), which expired on 
31.12.2009 is further extended by 01 month. Now these AEPs shall remain valid upto 
30th April, 2010. 
 
 
 
(Rohit Nandan) 
IAS 
Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
Distribution: As per the list attached.
